air.title: Air
air.plot: The history of the game-changing partnership between a then undiscovered Michael Jordan and Nike's fledgling basketball division which revolutionized the world of sports and culture with the Air Jordan brand.

alice in wonderland.title: Alice in Wonderland
alice in wonderland.plot: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

alien covenant.title: Alien: Covenant
alien covenant.plot: The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.

alien romulus.title: Alien: Romulus
alien romulus.plot: While scavenging the deep ends of a derelict space station, a group of young space colonists come face to face with the most terrifying life form in the universe.

alien.title: Alien
alien.plot: After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.

aliens.title: Aliens
aliens.plot: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

alita battle angel.title: Alita: Battle Angel
alita battle angel.plot: A deactivated cyborg's revived, but can't remember anything of her past and goes on a quest to find out who she is.

amazing spiderman.title: The Amazing Spiderman 2 Webb Cut
amazing spiderman.plot: The extended version of 2014's The Amazing Spider-Man 2. Includes never before seen footage and alternate takes of the movie.

american gangster.title: American Gangster
american gangster.plot: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

american sniper.title: American Sniper
american sniper.plot: Navy S.E.A.L. sniper Chris Kyle's pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend. Back home with his family after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he can't leave b...

andor.title: Andor
andor.plot: In an era filled with danger, deception, and intrigue, Cassian Andor embark on a path that is destined to turn him into a Rebel hero.

apocalypto.title: Apocalypto
apocalypto.plot: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

argo.title: Argo
argo.plot: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.

arrival.title: Arrival
arrival.plot: Linguist Louise Banks leads a team of investigators when gigantic spaceships touch down around the world. As nations teeter on the verge of global war, Banks and her crew must find a way to communicate with the extraterrestrial vi...

avatar the way of water.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
avatar the way of water.plot: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

avengers age of ultron.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
avengers age of ultron.plot: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

avengers endgame.title: Avengers: Endgame
avengers endgame.plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

avengers infinity war.title: Avengers: Infinity War
avengers infinity war.plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

avengers.title: The Avengers
avengers.plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

back to the future part ii.title: Back to the Future Part II
back to the future part ii.plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

back to the future part iii.title: Back to the Future Part III
back to the future part iii.plot: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is m...

back to the future.title: Back to the Future
back to the future.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

barbarian.title: Barbarian
barbarian.plot: A woman staying at an Airbnb discovers that the house she has rented is not what it seems.

batman begins.title: Batman Begins
batman begins.plot: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

batman v superman dawn of justice.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
batman v superman dawn of justice.plot: Batman is manipulated by Lex Luthor to fear Superman. Superman´s existence is meanwhile dividing the world and he is framed for murder during an international crisis. The heroes clash and force the neutral Wonder Woman to reemerge.

batman.title: Batman
batman.plot: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

battle los angeles.title: Battle Los Angeles
battle los angeles.plot: A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.

beauty and the beast.title: Beauty and the Beast
beauty and the beast.plot: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

bird box.title: Bird Box
bird box.plot: Five years after an ominous unseen presence drives most of society to suicide, a mother and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety.

birds of prey.title: Birds of Prey
birds of prey.plot: In the future, long after the Batman has driven himself into exile, his legacy lives on in the form of the Birds of Prey--Black Canary, Oracle, and the Huntress.

black adam.title: Black Adam
black adam.plot: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods--and imprisoned just as quickly--Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

black swan.title: Black Swan
black swan.plot: Nina is a talented but unstable ballerina on the verge of stardom. Pushed to the breaking point by her artistic director and a seductive rival, Nina's grip on reality slips, plunging her into a waking nightmare.

boys.title: Boys
boys.plot: A sexually awakening gay teen athlete finds himself in a budding relationship with his mutually attracted relay race teammate.

breaking bad.title: Breaking Bad
breaking bad.plot: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student to secure his family's future.

bumblebee.title: Bumblebee
bumblebee.plot: Bumblebee teams up with a teenage girl to protect the world while the Decepticons hunt him with the help of a secret agency.

captain america brave new world.title: Captain America: Brave New World
captain america brave new world.plot: Sam Wilson, the new Captain America, finds himself in the middle of an international incident and must discover the motive behind a nefarious global plan.

captain america civil war.title: Captain America: Civil War
captain america civil war.plot: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

captain america the first avenger.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
captain america the first avenger.plot: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a warmonger and a terrorist organiza...

captain america the winter soldier.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
captain america the winter soldier.plot: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

captain marvel.title: Captain Marvel
captain marvel.plot: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

cars.title: Cars
cars.plot: On the way to the biggest race of his life, a hotshot rookie race car gets stranded in a rundown town and learns that winning isn't everything in life.

casino.title: Casino
casino.plot: In Las Vegas, two best friends--a casino executive and a Mafia enforcer--compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

charlie and the chocolate factory.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
charlie and the chocolate factory.plot: Charlie, a young boy from an impoverished family, and four other kids win a tour of an amazing chocolate factory run by an imaginative chocolatier, Willy Wonka, and his staff of Oompa-Loompas.

cloverfield.title: Cloverfield
cloverfield.plot: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

coco.title: Coco
coco.plot: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

coraline.title: Coraline
coraline.plot: Wandering her rambling old house in her boring new town, a young girl discovers a hidden door to a strangely idealized version of her life that seems too good to be true.

creed ii.title: Creed II
creed ii.plot: Under the tutelage of Rocky Balboa, newly crowned heavyweight champion Adonis Creed faces off against Viktor Drago, the son of Ivan Drago.

creed iii.title: Creed III
creed iii.plot: Adonis has been thriving in both his career and family life, but when a childhood friend and former boxing prodigy resurfaces, the face-off is more than just a fight.

creed.title: Creed
creed.plot: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

daredevil.title: Daredevil
daredevil.plot: A blind lawyer by day, vigilante by night. Matt Murdock fights the crime of New York as Daredevil.

dark knight rises.title: The Dark Knight Rises
dark knight rises.plot: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

dark knight.title: The Dark Knight
dark knight.plot: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

dawn of the planet of the apes.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
dawn of the planet of the apes.plot: The fragile peace between apes and humans is threatened as mistrust and betrayal threaten to plunge both tribes into a war for dominance over the Earth.

demon slayer kimetsu no yaiba to the has.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu No Yaiba - To the Hashira Training
demon slayer kimetsu no yaiba to the has.plot: Tanjiro undergoes rigorous training with the Stone Hashira, Himejima, in his quest to become a Hashira. Meanwhile, Muzan continues to search for Nezuko and Ubuyashiki.

demon slayer kimetsu no yaiba to the swo.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu No Yaiba - To the Swordsmith Village
demon slayer kimetsu no yaiba to the swo.plot: Tanjiro needs to bring a definitive end to Upper Rank Six. After the dust settles, he goes with his sister Nezuko to the Swordsmith Village in search of a new sword.

departed.title: Departed
departed.plot: A student filmmaker sets out to explore the crisis in Venezuela and shed light on those who are still suffering in her home country.

dinosaur.title: Dinosaur
dinosaur.plot: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sanctuary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

disturbia.title: Disturbia
disturbia.plot: When a teenager is placed under house arrest, he succumbs to despair and starts spying on his neighbors, hoping to spice up his life. This, however, leads him to witness a serial killer on the loose.

doctor strange in the multiverse of madn.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
doctor strange in the multiverse of madn.plot: Doctor Strange teams up with a mysterious teenage girl who can travel across multiverses, to battle other-universe versions of himself which threaten to wipe out the multiverse. They seek help from the Scarlet Witch, Wong and others.

doctor strange.title: Doctor Strange
doctor strange.plot: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

donnie brasco.title: Donnie Brasco
donnie brasco.plot: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the Mafia life--at the expense of his regular one.

dragon ball super broly.title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
dragon ball super broly.plot: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

dune part two.title: Dune: Part Two
dune part two.plot: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he endeavors to prevent a terrible fu...

dune.title: Dune
dune.plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis to free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

dunkirk.title: Dunkirk
dunkirk.plot: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

fantastic four rise of the silver surfer.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
fantastic four rise of the silver surfer.plot: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus.

fantastic four.title: Fantastic Four
fantastic four.plot: A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom.

fast and furious.title: Fast and Furious
fast and furious.plot: Rare book dealers Joel and Garda take a summertime jaunt to the seashore where he becomes involved in a beauty pageant as investor and judge - much to her chagrin.

fast and the furious tokyo drift.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
fast and the furious tokyo drift.plot: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

fast and the furious.title: The Fast and the Furious
fast and the furious.plot: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to end it.

fast five.title: Fast Five
fast five.plot: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.

fate.title: Fate
fate.plot: Musa, who works as a bookkeeper in the customs office, believes in the emptiness and absurdity of life. He doesn't struggle to change his life; he lets himself flow along with events because he thinks that it all leads to the same...

fight club.title: Fight Club
fight club.plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

first man.title: First Man
first man.plot: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.

flight.title: Flight
flight.plot: Troubling questions arise after airline pilot Whip Whitaker makes a miracle landing after a mid-air catastrophe.

ford v ferrari.title: Ford v Ferrari
ford v ferrari.plot: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

furiosa.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
furiosa.plot: The origin story of renegade warrior Furiosa before her encounter and teamup with Mad Max.

game of thrones.title: Game of Thrones
game of thrones.plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

gladiator ii.title: Gladiator II
gladiator ii.plot: After his home is conquered by the tyrannical emperors who now lead Rome, Lucius is forced to enter the Colosseum and must look to his past to find strength to return the glory of Rome to its people.

gladiator.title: Gladiator
gladiator.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

godfather part ii.title: The Godfather Part II
godfather part ii.plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

godzilla king of the monsters.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
godzilla king of the monsters.plot: The crypto-zoological agency Monarch faces off against a battery of god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah.

godzilla minus one.title: Godzilla Minus One
godzilla minus one.plot: Post-war Japan is at its lowest point when a new crisis emerges in the form of a giant monster, baptized in the horrific power of the atomic bomb.

godzilla.title: Godzilla
godzilla.plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

godzilla x kong the new empire.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
godzilla x kong the new empire.plot: Two ancient titans, Godzilla and Kong, clash in an epic battle as humans unravel their intertwined origins and connection to Skull Island's mysteries.

good will hunting.title: Good Will Hunting
good will hunting.plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

goodfellas.title: Goodfellas
goodfellas.plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

gravity.title: Gravity
gravity.plot: Dr Ryan Stone, an engineer on her first space mission, and Matt Kowalski, an astronaut on his final expedition, have to survive in space after they are hit by debris while spacewalking.

great wall.title: The Great Wall
great wall.plot: In ancient China, a group of European mercenaries encounters a secret army that maintains and defends the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.

halo.title: Halo
halo.plot: With the galaxy on the brink of destruction, Master Chief John-117 leads his team of Spartans against the alien threat known as the Covenant.

hancock.title: Hancock
hancock.plot: Hancock is a superhero whose ill-considered behavior regularly causes damage in the millions. He changes when the person he saves helps him improve his public image.

harry potter and the chamber of secrets.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
harry potter and the chamber of secrets.plot: Harry Potter lives his second year at Hogwarts with Ron and Hermione when a message on the wall announces that the legendary Chamber of Secrets has been opened. The trio soon realize that, to save the school, it will take a lot of...

harry potter and the goblet of fire.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
harry potter and the goblet of fire.plot: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

harry potter and the half blood prince.title: Big Movie Premiere: Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince

harry potter and the order of the phoeni.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
harry potter and the order of the phoeni.plot: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban.plot: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

heat.title: Heat
heat.plot: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a verbal clue at their latest heist.

her.title: Her
her.plot: In the near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

hobbit an unexpected journey.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
hobbit an unexpected journey.plot: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

hobbit the battle of the five armies.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
hobbit the battle of the five armies.plot: Bilbo Baggins and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.

hobbit the desolation of smaug.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
hobbit the desolation of smaug.plot: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim the Lonely Mountain, their homeland, from the dragon Smaug.

how to train your dragon.title: How to Train Your Dragon
how to train your dragon.plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

hulk.title: Hulk
hulk.plot: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers a lab accident that makes him transform into a raging, giant green monster when angered, making him a target of forces seeking to abuse his power.

hunger games.title: The Hunger Games
hunger games.plot: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

i am legend.title: I Am Legend
i am legend.plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

i robot.title: I, Robot
i robot.plot: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

incredible hulk.title: The Incredible Hulk
incredible hulk.plot: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.

interstellar.title: Interstellar
interstellar.plot: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

invisible man.title: Invisible Man
invisible man.plot: Afraid to love or trust anyone, a man learns the true meaning of forgiveness. Follow his compelling journey of faith, love, healing, and recovery as he reaches his dreams.

irishman.title: The Irishman
irishman.plot: An illustration of Frank Sheeran's life, from W.W.II veteran to hit-man for the Bufalino crime family and his alleged assassination of his close friend Jimmy Hoffa.

iron man.title: Iron Man
iron man.plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

it chapter two.title: It Chapter Two
it chapter two.plot: Twenty-seven years after their first encounter with the terrifying Pennywise, the Losers Club have grown up and moved away, until a devastating phone call brings them back.

it.title: It
it.plot: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

jaws.title: Jaws
jaws.plot: When a massive killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Long Island, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

joker.title: Joker
joker.plot: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

jungle book.title: The Jungle Book
jungle book.plot: After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, a man-cub named Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of panther Bagheera and free-spirited bear Baloo.

jurassic park iii.title: Jurassic Park III
jurassic park iii.plot: A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.

jurassic park.title: Jurassic Park
jurassic park.plot: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

jurassic world dominion.title: Jurassic World Dominion
jurassic world dominion.plot: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.

jurassic world fallen kingdom.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
jurassic world fallen kingdom.plot: When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

jurassic world.title: Jurassic World
jurassic world.plot: A new theme park, built on the original site of Jurassic Park, creates a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur, the Indominus Rex, which escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

king kong.title: King Kong
king kong.plot: A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives.

kingdom of the planet of the apes.title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
kingdom of the planet of the apes.plot: Many years after the reign of Caesar, a young ape goes on a journey that will lead him to question everything he's been taught about the past and make choices that will define a future for apes and humans alike.

kong skull island.title: Kong: Skull Island
kong skull island.plot: After the Vietnam war, a team of scientists explores an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong and must fight to escape a primal Eden.

la la land.title: La La Land
la la land.plot: When Sebastian, a pianist, and Mia, an actress, follow their passion and achieve success in their respective fields, they find themselves torn between their love for each other and their careers.

lady and the tramp.title: Lady and the Tramp
lady and the tramp.plot: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

land before time.title: The Land Before Time
land before time.plot: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

lighthouse.title: Lighthouse
lighthouse.plot: Members of a sunken prison ship take refuge at an old lighthouse, unaware one of their most notorious criminals has taken shelter there as well.

lion king.title: The Lion King
lion king.plot: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

logan.title: Logan
logan.plot: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

lord of the rings the fellowship of the.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
lord of the rings the fellowship of the.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

lord of the rings the return of the king.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
lord of the rings the return of the king.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

lord of the rings the rings of power.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
lord of the rings the rings of power.plot: Epic drama set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings' follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared re-emergence of evil ...

lord of the rings the two towers.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
lord of the rings the two towers.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

lord of the rings the war of the rohirri.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
lord of the rings the war of the rohirri.plot: A sudden attack by Wulf, a clever and traitorous lord of Rohan seeking vengeance for the death of his father, forces Helm Hammerhand, the King of Rohan, and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the H...

lost world jurassic park.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
lost world jurassic park.plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

mad max fury road.title: Mad Max: Fury Road

martian.title: Martian
